svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/24.7.17 Chrome/128.0.6613.36 Electron/32.0.1 Safari/537.36" version="24.7.17"> <diagram id="4A9ti7t3Nn_d9M6WPQ-M" name="第 1 页"> <mxGraphModel dx="549" dy="635" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-19" value="" style="group" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="400" width="360" height="240" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-2" value="运算器" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=19;container=0;" vertex="1" parent="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-19"> <mxGeometry x="240" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-3" value="控制器" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=19;container=0;" vertex="1" parent="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-19"> <mxGeometry x="240" y="40" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-5" value="存储器" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=19;container=0;" vertex="1" parent="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-19"> <mxGeometry x="240" y="80" width="120" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-6" value="主存" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=19;container=0;" vertex="1" parent="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-19"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="80" width="160" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-7" value="辅存" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=19;container=0;" vertex="1" parent="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-19"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="120" width="160" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-8" value="输入设备" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=19;container=0;" vertex="1" parent="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-19"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="160" width="280" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-9" value="输出设备" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=19;container=0;" vertex="1" parent="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-19"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="200" width="280" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-10" value="ALU" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=19;container=0;" vertex="1" parent="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-19"> <mxGeometry x="120" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-11" value="CU" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=19;container=0;" vertex="1" parent="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-19"> <mxGeometry x="120" y="40" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-12" value="IO设备" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=19;container=0;" vertex="1" parent="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-19"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="120" width="40" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-13" value="CPU" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=19;container=0;" vertex="1" parent="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-19"> <mxGeometry x="80" width="40" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-15" value="主机" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=19;container=0;" vertex="1" parent="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-19"> <mxGeometry x="40" width="40" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-17" value="硬件" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=19;container=0;" vertex="1" parent="Keizpwog3kuWMha9kbWF-19"> <mxGeometry width="40" height="240" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
